title: E359 Ari Shaffir
itunes:title: Ari Shaffir
description:
Ari Shaffir is an American comedian from NYC and the host of the podcast: Skeptic Tank. Theo talks with Ari about eating guinea pigs in Ecuador, dealing with cancel culture and his beef with the Lakers.
